s0152.chinese: 三月中，呂后祓，還過軹道，見物如蒼犬，據高后掖，忽弗復見。
s0152.literal: Third month middle, Lu Hou purified, returning passed Zhi road, saw thing like blue dog, seized Gao Hou armpit, suddenly not again seen.
s0152.idiomatic: In the middle of the third month, Empress Lü purified herself. Returning, she passed Zhi road. She saw a thing like a blue dog. It seized Empress Gao's armpit. Suddenly it was not seen again.

s0153.literal: Divined it, said Zhao Wang Ruyi was haunting.
s0153.idiomatic: They divined it. It said King of Zhao Ruyi was haunting.

s0154.literal: Gao Hou then ill armpit injury.
s0154.idiomatic: Empress Gao then became ill with an armpit injury.

s0155.chinese: 高后為外孫魯元王偃年少，蚤失父母，孤弱，乃封張敖前姬兩子，侈為新都侯，壽為樂昌侯，以輔魯元王偃。
s0155.literal: Gao Hou for grandson Lu Yuan Wang Yan young, early lost parents, orphaned weak, then enfeoffed Zhang Ao former Ji two sons, Chi as Xindu Hou, Shou as Lechang Hou, to assist Lu Yuan Wang Yan.
s0155.idiomatic: Empress Gao, for her grandson King Lu Yuan Yan who was young and had early lost his parents, orphaned and weak, then enfeoffed Zhang Ao's former concubine's two sons. Chi as Lord Xindu, Shou as Lord Lechang, to assist King Lu Yuan Yan.

s0156.chinese: 及封中大謁者張釋為建陵侯，呂榮為祝茲侯。
s0156.literal: And enfeoffed middle grand usher Zhang Shi as Jianling Hou, Lu Rong as Zhuzi Hou.
s0156.idiomatic: And she enfeoffed the middle grand usher Zhang Shi as Lord Jianling, Lü Rong as Lord Zhuzi.

s0157.chinese: 諸中宦者令丞皆為關內侯，食邑五百戶。
s0157.literal: Various middle eunuchs commanders assistants all as Guan Nei Hou, eat fief five hundred households.
s0157.idiomatic: All the various middle eunuchs' commanders and assistants became Lords within the Pass, eating fiefs of five hundred households.

s0158.chinese: 七月中，高后病甚，乃令趙王呂祿為上將軍，軍北軍；
s0158.literal: Seventh month middle, Gao Hou illness severe, then ordered Zhao Wang Lu Lu as supreme general, army northern army;
s0158.idiomatic: In the middle of the seventh month, Empress Gao's illness was severe. She then ordered King of Zhao Lü Lu to be Supreme General, commanding the northern army;

s0159.literal: Lu Wang Chan resided southern army.
s0159.idiomatic: King Lü Chan resided in the southern army.

s0160.chinese: 呂太后誡產、祿曰：「高帝已定天下，與大臣約，曰『非劉氏王者，天下共擊之』。
s0160.literal: Lu empress dowager warned Chan, Lu said: 'Gao Di already pacified world, with ministers covenant, said 'not Liu clan wang ones, world together strike them'.
s0160.idiomatic: Empress Dowager Lü warned Chan and Lu saying: 'The High Emperor already pacified the world. He made covenant with ministers saying 'those who are not Liu clan and become kings, the world together shall strike them'.

s0161.literal: Now Lu clan wang, ministers not peaceful.
s0161.idiomatic: Now the Lü clan are kings. The ministers are not peaceful.

s0162.chinese: 我即崩，帝年少，大臣恐為變。
s0162.literal: I immediately pass, emperor young, ministers fear make change.
s0162.idiomatic: I will immediately pass. The emperor is young. Ministers fear he will make change.

s0163.chinese: 必據兵衛宮，慎毋送喪，毋為人所制。」
s0163.literal: Certainly occupy troops guard palace, careful not send funeral, not be people controlled.'
s0163.idiomatic: Certainly occupy troops to guard the palace. Be careful not to send funeral. Do not be controlled by people.'

s0164.chinese: 辛巳，高后崩，遺詔賜諸侯王各千金，將相列侯郎吏皆以秩賜金。
s0164.literal: Xin Si, Gao Hou passed, posthumous edict granted various hou wang each thousand gold, generals chancellors ranked hous gentlemen officials all by rank granted gold.
s0164.idiomatic: On Xin Si day, Empress Gao passed. By posthumous edict she granted the various marquises and kings each a thousand gold. Generals, chancellors, ranked marquises, gentlemen officials all received gold by their rank.

s0166.chinese: 以呂王產為相國，以呂祿女為帝后。
s0166.literal: With Lu Wang Chan as chancellor country, with Lu Lu female as emperor empress.
s0166.idiomatic: King Lü Chan became Chancellor of the State. Lü Lu's daughter became the emperor's empress.

s0167.chinese: 高后已葬，以左丞相審食其為帝太傅。
s0167.literal: Gao Hou already buried, with left chancellor Shen Shi Qi as emperor grand tutor.
s0167.idiomatic: After Empress Gao was buried, Left Chancellor Shen Shiqi became Emperor Grand Tutor.

s0168.chinese: 朱虛侯劉章有氣力，東牟侯興居其弟也。
s0168.literal: Zhu Xu Hou Liu Zhang had strength force, Dong Mou Hou Xing Ju his younger brother also.
s0168.idiomatic: Lord Zhu Xu Liu Zhang had strength and force. Lord Dong Mou Xing Ju was his younger brother.

s0169.literal: All Qi Ai Wang younger brothers, resided Chang'an.
s0169.idiomatic: They were all younger brothers of King Ai of Qi. They resided in Chang'an.

s0170.chinese: 當是時，諸呂用事擅權，欲為亂，畏高帝故大臣絳、灌等，未敢發。
s0170.literal: At this time, various Lu used affairs monopolized authority, wished make chaos, feared Gao Di former ministers Jiang, Guan etc., not dared issue.
s0170.idiomatic: At this time, the various Lü used affairs and monopolized authority. They wished to make chaos. They feared the High Emperor's former ministers Jiang, Guan, and others. They did not dare issue.

s0171.chinese: 朱虛侯婦，呂祿女，陰知其謀。
s0171.literal: Zhu Xu Hou wife, Lu Lu female, secretly knew their plot.
s0171.idiomatic: Lord Zhu Xu's wife, Lü Lu's daughter, secretly knew their plot.

s0172.chinese: 恐見誅，乃陰令人告其兄齊王，欲令發兵西，誅諸呂而立。
s0172.literal: Feared seen executed, then secretly made people inform his elder brother Qi Wang, wished order issue troops west, execute various Lu and establish.
s0172.idiomatic: She feared being seen and executed. She then secretly had people inform her elder brother King of Qi. She wished to order him to issue troops west, execute the various Lü and establish.

s0173.chinese: 朱虛侯欲從中與大臣為應。
s0173.literal: Zhu Xu Hou wished from middle with ministers as response.
s0173.idiomatic: Lord Zhu Xu wished from the middle to respond with ministers.

s0174.literal: Qi Wang wished issue troops, his chancellor not listened.
s0174.idiomatic: King of Qi wished to issue troops. His chancellor did not listen.

s0175.chinese: 八月丙午，齊王欲使人誅相，相召平乃反，舉兵欲圍王，王因殺其相，遂發兵東，詐奪瑯邪王兵，并將之而西。
s0175.literal: Eighth month Bing Wu, Qi Wang wished make people execute chancellor, chancellor summoned Ping then rebelled, raised troops wished surround wang, wang because killed his chancellor, then issued troops east, falsely seized Langya Wang troops, combined led them west.
s0175.idiomatic: In the eighth month, Bing Wu day, King of Qi wished to have people execute the chancellor. The chancellor summoned Ping and then rebelled. He raised troops wishing to surround the king. The king because of this killed his chancellor. He then issued troops east. He falsely seized King of Langya's troops. He combined and led them west.

s0176.literal: Words in Qi Wang words middle.
s0176.idiomatic: The words are in the King of Qi's biography.

s0177.chinese: 齊王乃遺諸侯王書曰：「高帝平定天下，王諸子弟，悼惠王王齊。
s0177.literal: Qi Wang then sent various hou wang letter said: 'Gao Di pacified world, wang various sons younger brothers, Dao Hui Wang wang Qi.
s0177.idiomatic: King of Qi then sent a letter to the various marquises and kings saying: 'The High Emperor pacified the world and made various sons and younger brothers kings. King Dao Hui became king of Qi.

s0178.chinese: 悼惠王薨，孝惠帝使留侯良立臣為齊王。
s0178.literal: Dao Hui Wang passed, Xiao Hui Emperor made Liu Hou Liang establish minister as Qi Wang.
s0178.idiomatic: King Dao Hui passed. Emperor Xiaohui had Marquis Liu Liang establish this minister as King of Qi.

s0179.chinese: 孝惠崩，高后用事，春秋高，聽諸呂，擅廢帝更立，又比殺三趙王，滅梁、趙、燕以王諸呂，分齊為四。
s0179.literal: Xiao Hui passed, Gao Hou used affairs, age high, listened various Lu, monopolized abolished emperor changed established, moreover killed three Zhao Wang, extinguished Liang, Zhao, Yan to wang various Lu, divided Qi as four.
s0179.idiomatic: Emperor Xiaohui passed. Empress Gao used affairs. Her age was high. She listened to the various Lü. She monopolized abolishing the emperor and changing the establishment. Moreover she killed three Kings of Zhao. She extinguished Liang, Zhao, Yan to make the various Lü kings. She divided Qi into four.

s0180.literal: Loyal ministers advanced remonstrated, above confused chaotic not listened.
s0180.idiomatic: Loyal ministers advanced and remonstrated. Above was confused and chaotic and did not listen.

s0181.chinese: 今高后崩，而帝春秋富，未能治天下，固恃大臣諸侯。
s0181.literal: Now Gao Hou passed, but emperor age rich, not able govern world, certainly relied ministers marquises.
s0181.idiomatic: Now Empress Gao has passed, but the emperor's age is rich. He is not able to govern the world. He certainly relies on ministers and marquises.

s0182.chinese: 而諸呂又擅自尊官，聚兵嚴威，劫列侯忠臣，矯制以令天下，宗廟所以危。
s0182.literal: But various Lu moreover monopolized self honored officials, gathered troops strict awe, coerced ranked hou loyal ministers, falsely controlled to command world, ancestral temple therefore danger.
s0182.idiomatic: But the various Lü moreover monopolized self-honored officials. They gathered troops with strict awe. They coerced ranked marquises and loyal ministers. They falsely controlled to command the world. The ancestral temple is therefore in danger.

s0183.chinese: 寡人率兵入誅不當為王者。」
s0183.literal: This orphan person leads troops enters executes not proper wang ones.'
s0183.idiomatic: This orphan person leads troops to enter and execute those who should not be kings.'

s0184.chinese: 漢聞之，相國呂產等乃遣潁陰侯灌嬰將兵擊之。
s0184.literal: Han heard it, chancellor Lu Chan etc. then sent Yingyin Hou Guan Ying lead troops strike it.
s0184.idiomatic: Han heard it. Chancellor Lü Chan and others then sent Lord Yingyin Guan Ying to lead troops and strike it.

s0185.chinese: 灌嬰至滎陽，乃謀曰：「諸呂權兵關中，欲危劉氏而自立。
s0185.literal: Guan Ying arrived Xingyang, then planned said: 'Various Lu authority troops Guan Zhong, wished endanger Liu clan and self establish.
s0185.idiomatic: Guan Ying arrived at Xingyang. He then planned and said: 'The various Lü have authority over troops in Guanzhong. They wish to endanger the Liu clan and establish themselves.

s0186.chinese: 今我破齊還報，此益呂氏之資也。」
s0186.literal: Now I break Qi return report, this increases Lu clan resource.'
s0186.idiomatic: Now if I break Qi and return to report, this increases the Lü clan's resources.'

s0187.chinese: 乃留屯滎陽，使使諭齊王及諸侯，與連和，以待呂氏變，共誅之。
s0187.literal: Then stayed garrisoned Xingyang, made envoy explain Qi Wang and various hou, with connected harmony, to await Lu clan change, together execute them.
s0187.idiomatic: He then stayed garrisoned at Xingyang. He sent envoys to explain to King of Qi and the various marquises. He connected in harmony with them to await the Lü clan's change. Together they would execute them.

s0188.chinese: 齊王聞之，乃還兵西界待約。
s0188.literal: Qi Wang heard it, then returned troops west border awaited agreement.
s0188.idiomatic: King of Qi heard it. He then returned troops to the western border to await agreement.

s0189.chinese: 呂祿、呂產欲發亂關中，內憚絳侯、朱虛等，外畏齊、楚兵，又恐灌嬰畔之，欲待灌嬰兵與齊合而發，猶豫未決。
s0189.literal: Lu Lu, Lu Chan wished issue chaos Guan Zhong, inner dreaded Jiang Hou, Zhu Xu etc., outer feared Qi, Chu troops, moreover feared Guan Ying rebel it, wished await Guan Ying troops with Qi combine then issue, hesitated not decided.
s0189.idiomatic: Lü Lu and Lü Chan wished to issue chaos in Guanzhong. Inside they dreaded Marquis Jiang, Lord Zhu Xu, and others. Outside they feared Qi and Chu troops. Moreover they feared Guan Ying would rebel. They wished to await Guan Ying's troops combining with Qi and then issue. They hesitated and had not decided.

s0190.chinese: 當是時，濟川王太、淮陽王武、常山王朝名為少帝弟，及魯元王呂后外孫，皆年少未之國，居長安。
s0190.literal: At this time, Ji Chuan Wang Tai, Huaiyang Wang Wu, Changshan Wang Zhao named as Shao Di younger brother, and Lu Yuan Wang Lu Hou grandson, all young not gone country, resided Chang'an.
s0190.idiomatic: At this time, King Ji Chuan Tai, King Huaiyang Wu, King Changshan Zhao named as the Young Emperor's younger brother, and King Lu Yuan Lü Hou's grandson, all were young and had not gone to their countries. They resided in Chang'an.

s0191.chinese: 趙王祿、梁王產各將兵居南北軍，皆呂氏之人。
s0191.literal: Zhao Wang Lu, Liang Wang Chan each led troops resided north south armies, all Lu clan people.
s0191.idiomatic: King of Zhao Lü Lu and King of Liang Lü Chan each led troops and resided in the northern and southern armies. They were all Lü clan people.

s0192.literal: Ranked hou multitude ministers none self firm their lives.
s0192.idiomatic: The ranked marquises and multitude ministers none could firm their lives.

s0193.chinese: 太尉絳侯勃不得入軍中主兵。
s0193.literal: Grand marshal Jiang Hou Bo not able enter army middle control troops.
s0193.idiomatic: Grand Marshal Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo was not able to enter the army and control the troops.

s0194.chinese: 曲周侯酈商老病，其子寄與呂祿善。
s0194.literal: Quzhou Hou Li Shang old ill, his son Ji with Lu Lu good.
s0194.idiomatic: Lord Quzhou Li Shang was old and ill. His son Ji was on good terms with Lü Lu.

s0195.chinese: 絳侯乃與丞相陳平謀，使人劫酈商。
s0195.literal: Jiang Hou then with chancellor Chen Ping planned, made people kidnap Li Shang.
s0195.idiomatic: Marquis Jiang then planned with Chancellor Chen Ping. They had people kidnap Li Shang.

s0196.chinese: 令其子寄往紿說呂祿曰：「高帝與呂后共定天下，劉氏所立九王，呂氏所立三王，皆大臣之議，事已布告諸侯，諸侯皆以為宜。
s0196.literal: Ordered his son Ji go deceive persuade Lu Lu said: 'Gao Di with Lu Hou together pacified world, Liu clan established nine wang, Lu clan established three wang, all ministers discussion, matter already announced various hou, various hou all considered suitable.
s0196.idiomatic: They ordered his son Ji to go and deceive Lü Lu saying: 'The High Emperor and Empress Lü together pacified the world. The Liu clan established nine kings. The Lü clan established three kings. All were ministers' discussions. The matter has already been announced to the various marquises. The various marquises all considered it suitable.

s0197.chinese: 今太后崩，帝少，而足下佩趙王印，不急之國守藩，乃為上將，將兵留此，為大臣諸侯所疑。
s0197.literal: Now empress dowager passed, emperor young, but foot below wears Zhao Wang seal, not urgent go country guard border, instead as supreme general, leads troops stays here, for ministers marquises suspected.
s0197.idiomatic: Now the Empress Dowager has passed. The emperor is young. But you wear the King of Zhao seal. You do not urgently go to your country to guard the border. Instead you are supreme general. You lead troops and stay here. You are suspected by ministers and marquises.

s0198.chinese: 足下何不歸印，以兵屬太尉？
s0198.literal: Foot below why not return seal, with troops belong grand marshal?
s0198.idiomatic: Why don't you return the seal and have the troops belong to the Grand Marshal?

s0199.chinese: 請梁王歸相國印，與大臣盟而之國，齊兵必罷，大臣得安，足下高枕而王千里，此萬世之利也。」
s0199.literal: Please Liang Wang return chancellor seal, with ministers covenant then go country, Qi troops certainly cease, ministers able peaceful, foot below high pillow wang thousand li, this ten thousand generations benefit.'
s0199.idiomatic: Please have King of Liang return the Chancellor seal. Covenant with ministers and then go to your country. Qi troops will certainly cease. Ministers will be able to be peaceful. You can lie on high pillow and be king of a thousand li. This is a benefit for ten thousand generations.'

s0200.chinese: 呂祿信然其計，欲歸將印，以兵屬太尉。
s0200.literal: Lu Lu believed indeed its plan, wished return general seal, with troops belong grand marshal.
s0200.idiomatic: Lü Lu believed indeed in the plan. He wished to return the general seal and have the troops belong to the Grand Marshal.

s0201.chinese: 使人報呂產及諸呂老人，或以為便，或曰不便，計猶豫未有所決。
s0201.literal: Made people report Lu Chan and various Lu elders, some considered convenient, some said inconvenient, plan hesitated not had decision.
s0201.idiomatic: He had people report to Lü Chan and the various Lü elders. Some considered it convenient. Some said inconvenient. The plan hesitated and had no decision.

s0202.chinese: 呂祿信酈寄，時與出游獵。
s0202.literal: Lu Lu trusted Li Ji, at time with went out roam hunt.
s0202.idiomatic: Lü Lu trusted Li Ji. At the time he went out with him to roam and hunt.

s0203.chinese: 過其姑呂媭，媭大怒，曰：「若為將而棄軍，呂氏今無處矣。」
s0203.literal: Passed his aunt Lu Kui, Kui greatly angered, said: 'You as general abandon army, Lu clan now nowhere.'
s0203.idiomatic: He passed his aunt Lü Kui. Kui was greatly angered. She said: 'You as general abandon the army. The Lü clan now has nowhere.'

s0204.chinese: 乃悉出珠玉寶器散堂下，曰：「毋為他人守也」
s0204.literal: Then completely took out pearl jade treasure vessels scattered hall below, said: 'Not for others guard.'
s0204.idiomatic: She then completely took out pearl, jade, and treasure vessels and scattered them below the hall. She said: 'Do not guard for others.'

s0205.idiomatic: Left Chancellor Shen Shiqi was dismissed.

s0206.chinese: 八月庚申旦，平陽侯窋行御史大夫事，見相國產計事。
s0206.literal: Eighth month Geng Shen dawn, Pingyang Hou Zhuo acted imperial censor grand master affairs, saw chancellor Chan planned affairs.
s0206.idiomatic: Eighth month, Geng Shen day dawn, Lord Pingyang Zhuo acted as Imperial Censor Grand Master affairs. He saw Chancellor Lü Chan to plan affairs.

s0207.chinese: 郎中令賈壽使從齊來，因數產曰：「王不蚤之國，今雖欲行，尚可得邪？」
s0207.literal: Gentleman middle commander Jia Shou envoy from Qi came, because counted Chan said: 'Wang not early go country, now though wish go, still can get?'
s0207.idiomatic: Gentleman-in-Attendance Jia Shou came as envoy from Qi. He counted Lü Chan and said: 'The king did not early go to his country. Now though he wishes to go, can he still get there?'

s0208.chinese: 具以灌嬰與齊楚合從，欲誅諸呂告產，乃趣產急入宮。
s0208.literal: Fully with Guan Ying with Qi Chu allied following, wished execute various Lu told Chan, then urged Chan urgently enter palace.
s0208.idiomatic: He fully informed Lü Chan that Guan Ying had allied with Qi and Chu in following. They wished to execute the various Lü. He then urged Lü Chan to urgently enter the palace.

s0209.chinese: 平陽侯頗聞其語，乃馳告丞相、太尉。
s0209.literal: Pingyang Hou somewhat heard its words, then galloped told chancellor, grand marshal.
s0209.idiomatic: Lord Pingyang somewhat heard the words. He then galloped to tell the chancellor and grand marshal.

s0210.literal: Grand marshal wished enter northern army, not able enter.
s0210.idiomatic: The Grand Marshal wished to enter the northern army. He was not able to enter.

s0211.literal: Xiangping Hou Tong still tally tally.
s0211.idiomatic: Lord Xiangping Tong still held the tally and seal.

s0212.chinese: 乃令持節矯內太尉北軍。
s0212.literal: Then ordered hold tally falsely bring in grand marshal northern army.
s0212.idiomatic: He then ordered to hold the tally and falsely bring the Grand Marshal into the northern army.

s0213.chinese: 太尉復令酈寄與典客劉揭先說呂祿曰：「帝使太尉守北軍，欲足下之國，急歸將印辭去，不然，禍且起。」
s0213.literal: Grand marshal again ordered Li Ji with palace attendant Liu Jie first persuade Lu Lu said: 'Emperor makes grand marshal guard northern army, wishes foot below go country, urgently return general seal resign leave, otherwise, calamity about rise.'
s0213.idiomatic: The Grand Marshal again ordered Li Ji and Palace Attendant Liu Jie to first persuade Lü Lu saying: 'The emperor makes the Grand Marshal guard the northern army. He wishes you to go to your country. Urgently return the general seal and resign to leave. Otherwise, calamity is about to rise.'

s0214.chinese: 呂祿以為酈兄不欺己，遂解印屬典客，而以兵授太尉。
s0214.literal: Lu Lu considered Li elder brother not deceive self, then untied seal belonged palace attendant, but with troops gave grand marshal.
s0214.idiomatic: Lü Lu considered that Li elder brother would not deceive him. He then untied the seal and gave it to the palace attendant. He gave the troops to the Grand Marshal.

s0215.chinese: 太尉將之入軍門，行令軍中曰：「為呂氏右袒，為劉氏左袒。」
s0215.literal: Grand marshal led them enter army gate, issued order army middle said: 'For Lu clan right bare, for Liu clan left bare.'
s0215.idiomatic: The Grand Marshal led them to enter the army gate. He issued the order in the army saying: 'For the Lü clan bare the right arm. For the Liu clan bare the left arm.'

s0216.literal: Army middle all left bare for Liu clan.
s0216.idiomatic: In the army all bared the left arm for the Liu clan.

s0217.chinese: 太尉行至，將軍呂祿亦已解上將印去，太尉遂將北軍。
s0217.literal: Grand marshal arrived, general Lu Lu also already untied supreme general seal gone, grand marshal then led northern army.
s0217.idiomatic: The Grand Marshal arrived. General Lü Lu had also already untied the supreme general seal and gone. The Grand Marshal then led the northern army.

s0218.idiomatic: However, there was still the southern army.

s0219.chinese: 平陽侯聞之，以呂產謀告丞相平，丞相平乃召朱虛侯佐太尉。

s0221.chinese: 令平陽侯告衛尉：「毋入相國產殿門。」

s0222.chinese: 呂產不知呂祿已去北軍，乃入未央宮，欲為亂，殿門弗得入，裴回往來。

s0223.chinese: 平陽侯恐弗勝，馳語太尉。

s0224.chinese: 太尉尚恐不勝諸呂，未敢訟言誅之，乃遣朱虛侯謂曰：「急入宮衛帝。」

s0225.chinese: 朱虛侯請卒，太尉予卒千餘人。

s0226.chinese: 入未央宮門，遂見產廷中。

s0228.chinese: 產走，天風大起，以故其從官亂，莫敢鬬。

s0229.chinese: 逐產，殺之郎中府吏廁中。

s0230.chinese: 朱虛侯已殺產，帝命謁者持節勞朱虛侯。

s0231.chinese: 朱虛侯欲奪節信，謁者不肯，朱虛侯則從與載，因節信馳走，斬長樂衛尉呂更始。

s0233.chinese: 太尉起，拜賀朱虛侯曰：「所患獨呂產，今已誅，天下定矣。」

s0234.chinese: 遂遣人分部悉捕諸呂男女，無少長皆斬之。

s0235.chinese: 辛酉，捕斬呂祿，而笞殺呂媭。

s0236.chinese: 使人誅燕王呂通，而廢魯王偃。

s0237.chinese: 壬戌，以帝太傅食其復為左丞相。

s0238.chinese: 戊辰，徙濟川王王梁，立趙幽王子遂為趙王。

s0239.chinese: 遣朱虛侯章以誅諸呂氏事告齊王，令罷兵。

s0241.chinese: 諸大臣相與陰謀曰：「少帝及梁、淮陽、常山王，皆非真孝惠子也。

s0242.chinese: 呂后以計詐名他人子，殺其母，養後宮，令孝惠子之，立以為後，及諸王，以彊呂氏。

s0243.chinese: 今皆已夷滅諸呂，而置所立，即長用事，吾屬無類矣。

s0244.chinese: 不如視諸王最賢者立之。」

s0245.chinese: 或言「齊悼惠王高帝長子，今其適子為齊王，推本言之，高帝適長孫，可立也」。

s0246.chinese: 大臣皆曰：「呂氏以外家惡而幾危宗廟，亂功臣今齊王母家駟（鈞），駟鈞，惡人也。

s0248.chinese: 欲立淮南王，以為少，母家又惡。

s0249.chinese: 乃曰：「代王方今高帝見子，最長，仁孝寬厚。

s0251.chinese: 且立長故順，以仁孝聞於天下，便。」

s0252.chinese: 乃相與共陰使人召代王。

s0255.chinese: 後九月晦日己酉，至長安，舍代邸。

s0256.chinese: 大臣皆往謁，奉天子璽上代王，共尊立為天子。

s0257.chinese: 代王數讓，群臣固請，然後聽。

s0258.chinese: 東牟侯興居曰：「誅呂氏吾無功，請得除宮。」

s0259.chinese: 乃與太仆汝陰侯滕公入宮，前謂少帝曰：「足下非劉氏，不當立。」

s0260.chinese: 乃顧麾左右執戟者掊兵罷去。

s0261.chinese: 有數人不肯去兵，宦者令張澤諭告，亦去兵。

s0262.chinese: 滕公乃召乘輿車載少帝出。

s0266.chinese: 乃奉天子法駕，迎代王於邸。

s0269.chinese: 有謁者十人持戟衛端門，曰：「天子在也，足下何為者而入？」

s0271.chinese: 太尉往諭，謁者十人皆掊兵而去。

s0273.chinese: 夜，有司分部誅滅梁、淮陽、常山王及少帝於邸。

s0275.chinese: 二十三年崩，謚為孝文皇帝。

s0276.chinese: 太史公曰：孝惠皇帝、高后之時，黎民得離戰國之苦，君臣俱欲休息乎無為，故惠帝垂拱，高后女主稱制，政不出房戶，天下晏然。
